content.title: Moonshine Inc.
content.tagline: A unique simulation-management game about alcohol creation.

content.paragraph:
Moonshine Inc. is a tycoon-simulator aiming to highlight the joy of brewing alcohol in the woods while avoiding police at all cost!
Dozens of apparatuses, recipes and ingredients are available to experiment and create various liquors.
The whole recipe system is dynamic and flexible, allowing players to mix different kind of ingredients to achieve unique blend of flavors and sugar concentration.

Moonshine Inc. was an interesting project to work on to say the least. I had to work on various tasks, from core design to content design, balancing, documentation, and so on.
Moonshine Inc. was desgined and created during the course of 20 months with a team of a dozen, including artists, programmers and designers.
Moonshine Inc. is a unique take on the sim-tycoon genre and was a great challenge from start to finish.
